General.Name: Xian International Medical Investment Co Ltd
General.Description: Xi'an International Medical Investment Company Limited provides healthcare services. It operates hospitals and medical centers. It also engages in insurance broking, tourism, and pharmaceutical production business. The company was formerly known as Xi'an Kaiyuan Investment Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Xi'an International Medical Investment Company Limited in January 2015. The company was founded in 1986 and is based in Xi'an, China.
